; ; Do not change the interface of public operations since the UNIFACE component engine ; relies on these when executing entity service behavior. The implementation can be modified. ; ; Exception: the interface and implementation of public operations named uz* can be modified. ; These operations are not used by the UNIFACE component engine. ;
; ; Entity Service operations ; public (inter-component) operations are named u*. ; partner (intra-component) operations are named z*. ; More details are listed at the bottom of this trigger. ;
#define keyError = -1 #define keyNew = 0
#define keyInHitList = 1 #define keyInDatabase = 2 #define primaryKey = 1
public operation uRetr<esvEntity> ; purpose: retrieve a list of occurrences given a particular profile ; pre: first READ trigger at client component params entity <esvEntity> : OUT ; list of retrieved occurrences occurrence <esvEntity> : IN ; profile occurrence string fieldList : IN ; fields to be retrieved into <esvEntity> string where : IN ; where clause for read (only used when called explicitly) string uWhere : IN ; uWhere clause for read (only used when called explicitly) endparams variables numeric n endvariables
if (where != "" & uWhere != "") $instancehandle()->zException("uRetr<esvEntity>", "One of the parameters 'where' and 'uwhere' must be empty.") return (-1) endif
$instancehandle()->zRetrA<esvEntity>(fieldList, n, where, uWhere) ; profile occ. is unpacked and made current. Retrieve the data.
if (n >= 0) set $subsetreturn("<esvEntity>") ; data to be returned is subsetted to the just retrieved set
if ($status < 0) $instancehandle()->zProcError($procerrorcontext) return (-1) endif endif
return (n) ; data is packed and returned by UNIFACE end ; uRetr<esvEntity>
public operation uStore<esvEntity> ; purpose: indicate a store transaction (i.e. a serie of Proc statements 'write' and 'delete' at the client) ; pre: Proc statement 'store' at client component
$inStore$ = 1 end ; uStore<esvEntity>
public operation uUpd<esvEntity> ; purpose: create or update an occurrence. Similar to uRem<esvEntity> ; pre: Proc statement 'write' at client component ; uStore params string fieldList : IN ; fields to be updated occurrence <esvEntity> : IN ; source occurrence: contains key + data for update endparams variables string keyFields numeric n endvariables
if (!$inStore$) $instancehandle()->zException("uUpd<esvEntity>", "uStore must be called before uUpd.") remocc "<esvEntity>" return (-1) endif
findkey "<esvEntity>", 1 ; look-up if we already have the source occurrence in our hitlist
selectcase $status
case <keyError> $instancehandle()->zProcError($procerrorcontext) remocc "<esvEntity>" ; remove source occurrence return (-1)
case <keyNew> ; not in our hitlist, nor in database creocc "<esvEntity>"
if (n = -1) return (-1) endif
setocc "<esvEntity>", $curocc+1 ; position on source occurrence moveocc "<esvEntity>", $curocc-1, fieldList ; move data, delete source occurrence and position on target occurrence
if ($status < 0) ; move data was unsucessful $instancehandle()->zProcError($procerrorcontext) remocc "<esvEntity>" ; remove source occurrence ... setocc "<esvEntity>", $curocc-1 remocc "<esvEntity>" ; ... and remove target occurrence return (-1) endif
$occhandle()->afterCreate(n)
case <keyInHitlist> ; already as target occurrence in our hitlist (position now in $result) moveocc "<esvEntity>", $result, fieldList ; move data into target occurrence
if ($status < 0) ; move unsuccessful $instancehandle()->zProcError($procerrorcontext) remocc "<esvEntity>" ; remove source occurrence return (-1) endif
$occhandle()->afterUpdate(n)
case <keyInDatabase> ; already in database, but not in our hitlist. Retrieve into hitlist and update it. keyFields = $keyfields("<esvEntity>", <primaryKey>) putlistitems/id keyFields ; copy source occurrence's primary key data into keyFields creocc "<esvEntity>" ; create profile occurrence. getlistitems/id keyFields ; paste primary key data into profile occurrence
$instancehandle()->zRetrA<esvEntity>(fieldList, n, "", "") ; retrieve target
if (n < 0) ; retrieve unsucessful, target occurrence removed remocc "<esvEntity>" ; remove source occurrence return (-1)
else setocc "<esvEntity>", $curocc+1 ; position on source occurrence moveocc "<esvEntity>", $curocc-1, fieldList ; move data from source into target, delete source and position on target
if ($status < 0) ; move unsucessful $instancehandle()->zProcError($procerrorcontext) remocc "<esvEntity>" ; remove source occurrence return (-1) endif endif
$occhandle()->afterUpdate(n)
endselectcase
return (n) end ; uUpd<esvEntity>
public operation uRem<esvEntity> ; purpose: mark an occurrence for deletion. Similar to uUpd<esvEntity> ; pre: Proc statement 'delete' at client component ; uStore ; pre: uStore params occurrence <esvEntity> : IN ; source occurrence endparams variables numeric n endvariables
if (!$inStore$)
$instancehandle()->zException("uRem<esvEntity>", "uStore<esvEntity> must be called before uRem<esvEntity>.") remocc "<esvEntity>" ; remove source occurrence return (-1) endif
findkey "<esvEntity>", 1 ; look-up target occurrence
selectcase $status
case <KeyError> $instancehandle()->zProcError($procerrorcontext) remocc "<esvEntity>" ; remove source occurrence return (-1)
case <keyNew> ; already removed - done
case <keyInHitlist> moveocc "<esvEntity>", $result, "" ; remove source and position on target
if ($status < 0) ; move unsuccessful $instancehandle()->zProcError($procerrorcontext) return (-1) endif
case <keyInDatabase> $instancehandle()->zRetrA<esvEntity>("", n, "", "") ; retrieve it for removal
if (n < 0) return (n) endif endselectcase
$occhandle()->beforeRemove(n)
if (n = 0) remocc "<esvEntity>" endif
return (n) end ; UREM<esvEntity>
public operation uEndStore ; purpose: indicate store transaction is completed, start physical store process ; pre: last Proc statement 'write' or 'delete' at client component ; uStore variables numeric n endvariables
$inStore$ = 0 $instancehandle()->zSave<esvEntity>(n) ; communicate physical write and delete to DBMS return (n) end ; uEndStore
public operation uReload<esvEntity> ; purpose: reload occurrence ; pre: Proc statement 'reload' at client component params occurrence <esvEntity> : INOUT ; occurrence to be reloaded endparams variables numeric n endvariables
findkey "<esvEntity>", 1 ; look-up target occurrence
selectcase $status
case <keyError> $instancehandle()->zProcError($procerrorcontext) remocc "<esvEntity>" ; remove profile occurrence return (-1)
case <keyNew> $instancehandle()->zException("uReload<esvEntity>", "Occurrence does not exist.") remocc "<esvEntity>" ; remove profile occurrence return (-1)
case <keyInHitlist> moveocc "<esvEntity>", $result, "" ; remove profile occurrence and position on occurrence to be locked if ($status < 0) $instancehandle()->zProcError($procerrorcontext) remocc "<esvEntity>" ; remove profile occurrence return (-1) endif
case <keyInDatabase> $instancehandle()->zRetrA<esvEntity>("", n, "", "") ; retrieve it into hitlist
if (n < 0) return (n) endif endselectcase
reload n = $status
if (n < 0) $instancehandle()->zProcError($procerrorcontext) endif
return (n) end ; uReload<esvEntity>
public operation uLock<esvEntity> ; purpose: lock occurrence ; pre: Proc statement 'lock' at client component params occurrence <esvEntity> : IN ; profile occurrence to be locked endparams variables numeric n endvariables
findkey "<esvEntity>", 1 ; look-up target occurrence
selectcase $status
case <keyError> $instancehandle()->zProcError($procerrorcontext) remocc "<esvEntity>" ; remove profile occurrence return (-1)
case <keyNew> $instancehandle()->zException("uLock<esvEntity>", "Occurrence does not exist.") remocc "<esvEntity>" ; remove profile occurrence return (-1)
case <keyInHitlist> moveocc "<esvEntity>", $result, "" ; remove profile occurrence and position on occurrence to be locked if ($status < 0) $instancehandle()->zProcError($procerrorcontext) remocc "<esvEntity>" ; remove profile occurrence return (-1) endif
case <keyInDatabase> $instancehandle()->zRetrA<esvEntity>("", n, "", "") ; retrieve it into hitlist
if (n < 0) return (n) endif endselectcase
lock n = $status
if (n < 0) $instancehandle()->zProcError($procerrorcontext) endif
return (n) end ; uLock<esvEntity>
public operation uCommit ; purpose: commit transaction on ESV subtype's DBMS path ; pre: Proc statement 'commit' at client component variables numeric n endvariables
commit n = $status
if (n < 0) $instancehandle()->zProcError($procerrorcontext) endif
return (n) end ; uCommit
public operation uRollBack ; purpose: rollback transaction on ESV subtype's DBMS path ; pre: Proc statement 'rollback' at client component variables numeric n endvariables
clear rollback n = $status
if (n < 0) $instancehandle()->zProcError($procerrorcontext)
endif
return (n) end ; uRollback
public operation uzGetCollHandle ; purpose: issue a handle to the ESV entity collection, in order to ; let the client directly invoke operations on it ; pre: - ; post: if handle exists, then h contains handle, else h = "" params handle h : OUT endparams
h = $collHandle("<esvEntity>") end ; uzGetCollHandle
public operation uzGetOccHandle ; purpose: issue a handle to the ESV entity's current occurrence ; let the client directly invoke operations on it ; pre: - ; post: if occurrence exists, then h contains handle, else h = "" params handle h : OUT endparams
h = $occHandle("<esvEntity>") end ; uzGetOccHandle
; ; Partner (intra-component) operations. ;
partner operation zRetrA<esvEntity> params string fieldList : IN numeric n : OUT string where : IN string uWhere : IN endparams
if (where != "") $where$ = where elseif (uWhere != "") $uWhere$ = uWhere endif
$selectlist ("<esvEntity>") = fieldList retrieve/a "<esvEntity>" n = $status
if (n < 0) $instancehandle()->zProcError($procErrorContext) remocc "<esvEntity>" ; remove profile endif end ; zRetrA<esvEntity>
partner operation zSave<esvEntity> params numeric n : OUT endparams
store/e "<esvEntity>" n = $status
if (n < 0) $instancehandle()->zProcError($procErrorContext) endif end ; zSave<esvEntity>
partner operation zProcError ; purpose: report an unexpected failure in a Proc statement ; client: - ; pre: context contains information about $procErrorContext params string pContext : IN endparams variables string vError string vErrorDescr string vOperationName endvariables
getitem/id vError, pContext, "error" getitem/id vErrorDescr, pContext, "description" getitem/id vOperationName, pContext, "procName" putmess "Error detected by entity service %%$componentName()%%%, operation %%vOperationName%%%. %%vErrorDescr%%% (%%vError%%%)" end ; zProcError
partner operation zException params string pOperationName : IN string pErrorDescr : IN endparams
putmess "Exception detected by entity service %%$componentName()%%%, operation %%pOperationName%%% failed. %%pErrorDescr%%%" end ; zException
; ; The following protocol applies in case of cautious locking at the client component:
; Client component Server component - public operations ; ---------------- ------------------------------------ ; first READ trigger operation uRetr<esvEntity> ; reload operation uReload<esvEntity> ; lock operation uLock<esvEntity> ; store operation uStore<esvEntity> ; write operation uUpd<esvEntity> ; delete operation uRem<esvEntity> ; last write or delete operation uEndStore ; commit operation uCommit ; rollback operation uRollback ; ; ; Component attributes: ; $where$ where clause of read Proc statement at client component ; $uWhere$ u_where clause of read Proc statement at client component ; $inStore$ true while uStore ... uEndStore ;

retrieve/o if ($status < 0) if ($status = -15) message $text(2202) ; multiple hits: in foreign entity if ($status = -14) message $text(2205) ; multiple hits: not in foreign entity if ($status = -11) message $text(2009) ; occurrence currently locked if ($status = -7) message $text(2006) ; duplicate key if ($status = -4) message $text(2003) ; cannot open table or file if ($status = -3) message $text(2002) ; exceptional I/O error if ($status = -2) message $text(2200) ; key not found:in foreign entity else if ($status = 1) message $text(2201) ; key not found: foreign entity w/WRITE UP if ($status = 2) ; one occurrence found in foreign entity retrieve/e if ($status < 0) message $text(2002) ; I/O error detected endif if ($status = 3) message $text(2203) ; occurrence un-removed if ($status = 4) message $text(2204) ; key found: occurrence repositioned endif
return ($status)

findkey $entname, $curkey
selectcase $status case 0 ; key not found if ($foreign) ; non existing key in up entity return (-1) ; only if Write Up trigger not filled endif
case 1 ; key found in Component if (!$foreign) ; duplicate key in down entity return (-1) endif
case 2 ; key found in DBMS if (!$foreign) ; duplicate key in down entity return (-1) endif endselectcase
return (0)

return ($status)

; If the SSV Subtype has the 'Data Access' property set to 'DBMS', ; then the Proc statement 'read' is propagated by the UNIFACE Component Engine ; to the DBMS Driver.
; If the SSV subtype has the 'Data Access' property set to 'Entity Service', ; then the first Proc statement 'read' is propagated by the UNIFACE Component Engine ; to the 'uRetr...' operation at the Entity Service. ; At the Entity Service, a sequence of Read Triggers is fired. ; The Proc statement 'read' in these Triggers is propagated by the UNIFACE Component Engine ; to the DBMS Driver. A hitlist is built on the Entity Service. ; After the last 'read' at the Entity Service, the hitlist is implicitly returned to the Session Service. ; Here, another sequence of Read Triggers is fired, in order to load the hitlist into ; the Session Service Component Structure.
read

; If the SSV Subtype has the 'Data Access' property set to 'DBMS', ; then the Proc statement 'write' is propagated by the UNIFACE Component Engine ; to the DBMS Driver.
; If the SSV subtype has the 'Data Access' property set to 'Entity Service', ; then each Proc statement 'write' is propagated by the UNIFACE Component Engine ; to the 'uUpd...' operation at the Entity Service. ; After the last 'write' or 'delete' at the Session Service, the UNIFACE Component Engine ; implicitly activates the 'uEndStore' operation at the Entity Service. ; This operation contains a Proc statement 'store', resulting in ; a sequence of Write and Delete Triggers at the Entity Service. ; There, the Proc statements 'write' and 'delete' are propagated by the UNIFACE Component Engine ; to the DBMS Driver.
write

; If the SSV Subtype has the 'Data Access' property set to 'DBMS', ; then the Proc statement 'delete' is propagated by the UNIFACE Component Engine ; to the DBMS Driver.
; If the SSV subtype has the 'Data Access' property set to 'Entity Service', ; each Proc statement 'delete' is propagated by the UNIFACE Component Engine ; to the 'uUpd...' operation at the Entity Service. ; After the last 'write' or 'delete' at the Session Service, the UNIFACE Component Engine ; implicitly activates the 'uEndStore' operation at the Entity Service. ; This operation contains a Proc statement 'store', resulting in ; a sequence of Write and Delete Triggers at the Entity Service. ; There, the Proc statements 'write' and 'delete' are propagated by the UNIFACE Component Engine ; to the DBMS Driver.
delete

; If the SSV Subtype has the 'Data Access' property set to 'DBMS', ; then the Proc statement 'lock' is propagated by the UNIFACE Component Engine ; to the DBMS Driver.
; If the SSV subtype has the 'Data Access' property set to 'Entity Service', ; then the Proc statement 'lock' is propagated by the UNIFACE Component Engine ; to the 'uLock' operation at the Entity Service. ; At the Entity Service, the Proc statement 'lock' is propagated by the UNIFACE Component Engine ; to the DBMS Driver.

; For the definition of <myDtd>, see the Defines trigger
operation deleteall params xmlstream [dtd:<myDtd>] x : INOUT numeric pError : OUT string pErrorContext : OUT endparams
pError = 0 ; initialize $procerror return value pErrorContext = "" ; initialize $procerrorcontext return value
xmlload x, "dtd:<myDtd>" ; load xml data x into component structure
if ($status >= 0) ; xmlload successful
#ifdefined ssvEntity if ($empty("<ssvEntity>") = 0) ; there is data #else if ($empty = 0) ; there is data #endif retrieve/reconnect ; fire Read Trigger for changed or deleted occurrences
if ($status = 0) ; validate successful erase
if ($status < 0) ; erase error pError = $procerror pErrorContext = $procerrorcontext rollback
elseif ($status = 0) ; erase successful commit
if ($status < 0) ; commit failed pError = $procerror pErrorContext = $procerrorcontext rollback
endif endif
else ; retrieve/reconnect failed pError = -35 putitem/id pErrorContext, "error", "-35" putitem/id pErrorContext, "component", $componentname putitem/id pErrorContext, "procname", "deleteAll()" putitem/id pErrorContext, "description", "Reconnect failed" rollback endif endif
else ; xmlload failed pError = $procerror pErrorContext = $procerrorcontext endif
; Return the result set as xmlStream to the Client. Validation errors are written ; by the UNIFACE Component Engine in this stream using the 'valerr' meta-attribute. ; Upon loading the xmlStream by the Client, On Error Triggers are fired ; and the errors can be processed. xmlsave x, "dtd:<myDtd>" ; return xml document to client
if ($status < 0) ; xmlsave failed pError = $procerror pErrorContext = $procerrorcontext endif
; Possible errors are reported in 'error' and 'errorcontext' return (0) End ; operation deleteAll

; For the definition of <myDtd>, see the Defines trigger
operation load params xmlstream [dtd:<myDtd>] x : INOUT numeric pError : OUT string pErrorContext : OUT endparams
pError = 0 ; initialize $procerror return value pErrorContext = "" ; initialize $procerrorcontext return value
xmlload x, "dtd:<myDtd>" ; load retrieve-profile x into component structure
if ($status >= 0) ; xmlload successful retrieve
if ($status = 0) ; retrieve successful xmlsave x, "dtd:<myDtd>" endif endif
pError = $procerror pErrorContext = $procerrorcontext
; Possible errors are reported in 'error' and 'errorContext' return (0)
End ; operation load

; For the definition of <myDtd>, see the Defines trigger
operation save params xmlstream [dtd:<myDtd>] x : INOUT numeric pError : OUT string pErrorContext : OUT endparams
pError = 0 ; initialize $procerror return value pErrorContext = "" ; initialize $procerrorcontext return value
xmlload x, "dtd:<myDtd>" ; load xml data x into component structure
if ($status >= 0) ; xmlload successful
#ifdefined ssvEntity if ($empty("<ssvEntity>") = 0) ; there is data #else if ($empty = 0) ; there is data #endif retrieve/reconnect ; fire Read Trigger for changed or deleted occurrences
if ($status = 0) ; reconnect successful store ; validate and store
if ($status < 0) ; store error pError = $procerror pErrorContext = $procerrorcontext rollback
elseif ($status = 0) ; store successful commit
if ($status < 0) ; commit failed pError = $procerror pErrorContext = $procerrorcontext rollback
endif endif
else ; retrieve/reconnect failed pError = -35 putitem/id pErrorContext, "error", "-35" putitem/id pErrorContext, "component", $componentname putitem/id pErrorContext, "procname", "Save()" putitem/id pErrorContext, "description", "Reconnect failed" rollback endif endif
else ; xmlload failed pError = $procerror pErrorContext = $procerrorcontext endif
; Return the result set as xmlStream to the Client. Validation errors are written ; by the UNIFACE Component Engine in this stream using the 'valerr' meta-attributes. ; Upon loading the xmlStream by the Client, On Error Triggers are fired ; and the errors can be processed. xmlsave x, "dtd:<myDtd>" ; return xml document to client
if ($status < 0) ; xmlsave failed pError = $procerror pErrorContext = $procerrorcontext endif
; Possible errors are reported in 'error' and 'errorContext' return (0) End ; operation save

partner operation zProcError ; Report an unexpected failure in a Proc statement. ; pre : context contains information about $procErrorContext ; post: context is displayed to the user params string pContext : IN endparams variables string vError, vComponentName, vOperationName, vErrorDescr endvariables getitem/id vError, pContext, "error" getitem/id vComponentName, pContext, "component" getitem/id vOperationName, pContext, "procname" getitem/id vErrorDescr, pContext, "description" #ifdefined uspEntity $webinfo("OUTPUT") = "%%$webinfo("OUTPUT")
%%%Error detected by %%vComponentName%%%, operation %%vOperationName%%%. %%vErrorDescr%%% (%%vError%%%)" ; Show error in USP. #else message/error "Error detected by %%vComponentName%%%, operation %%vOperationName%%%. %%vErrorDescr%%% (%%vError%%%)" #endif End ; operation zProcError

^BEGIN_DEVICE Unicode Printer
^^ This identifies the device as a printer installed in Windows. ^^ It will enable automatic page size determination, font scaling, ^^ image printing, etc. Note that this can only be used when the ^^ selected queue is 'PrintMan'.
MSW type
^^ Device modes can use three different syntaxes for Windows printers:
^^ mode_n(cols,rows) Fixed page size (e.g. for labels) ^^ mode_n(0, scale) Auto page size with font scaling ^^ mode_n(0, scale)[opts,copies] Auto page size with font scaling, ^^ options and multiple copies. ^^ opts=2: landscape ^^ opts=4: draft mode ^^ Combine options by adding them.
^^ If you want accurate printing on pre-printed stock, use a fixed ^^ page size (i.e. first syntax) and select a device font (indicated ^^ by a printer icon) in the setup dialogs for best results.
^NUL mode_0(0,100) ^NUL mode_1(0,100)[2,1] ^NUL mode_2(0,75) ^NUL mode_3(0,75)[2,1] ^NUL mode_4(0,100)[4,1] ^NUL mode_5(0,50)[4,1] ^NUL mode_6(40,6) Big labels ^NUL mode_7(32,4) Small labels
^^ Sequences to control print features. Features can be disabled by ^^ simply specifying a ^NUL sequence, e.g. "^NUL inverse".
^ESC^FF formfeed ^ESC^CR return ^ESC^LF linefeed
^ESC^001 normal ^ESC^002 bold ^ESC^003 italic ^ESC^004 underline ^ESC^005 bol_ita ^ESC^006 bol_und ^ESC^007 ita_und ^ESC^008 bol_ita_und
^ESC^020 novideo ^ESC^021 blink ^ESC^022 high ^ESC^023 inverse ^ESC^024 underscore ^ESC^025 bli_hig ^ESC^026 bli_inv ^ESC^027 bli_und ^ESC^028 hig_inv ^ESC^029 hig_und ^ESC^030 inv_und ^ESC^031 bli_hig_inv ^ESC^032 bli_hig_und ^ESC^033 bli_inv_und ^ESC^034 hig_inv_und ^ESC^035 bli_hig_inv_und
^END_DEVICE
^BEGIN_SET 0 ^^ ANSI Character Set ^ESC^100 select ^CHR ^REPEAT ^CHR/8 ^REPEAT ^END_SET
^BEGIN_SET 1 ^^ Unicode CharacterSet
^ESC^101 select ^UTF-8 ^REPEAT ^END_SET

Meta_Simplified_chinese ^Keyboard
^^ Keyboard translation table: MSWINX_GB
^^ Characterset ^^ Chinese GB, DBCS
^^ Prefixes ^^ None GB Character ^^ ^128 Function ^^ ^129 Function, Shift ^^ ^130 Function, Ctrl ^^ ^131 Function, Shift+Ctrl ^^ ^132 Function, Alt ^^ ^133 Function, Shift+Alt ^^ ^134 Function, Ctrl+Alt ^^ ^135 Function, Shift+Ctrl+Alt (Not used) ^^ ^136 Keypad ^^ ^137 Keypad, Shift ^^ ^138 Keypad, Ctrl ^^ ^139 Keypad, Shift+Ctrl ^^ ^140 Keypad, Alt ^^ ^141 Keypad, Shift+Alt ^^ ^142 Keypad, Ctrl+Alt ^^ ^143 Keypad, Shift+Ctrl+Alt (Not used)
^^ Special keys (all prefixed) ^^ ^BS Backspace \ ^^ ^HT Tab | ^^ ^CR Return/Enter | ^^ ^ESC Escape | ^^ ^42 * | ^^ ^43 + | These keys are represented by ^^ ^45 - | their prefixed ASCII/GB code. ^^ ^46 . | ^^ ^47 / | ^^ ^48 0 | ^^ : : | ^^ ^57 9 /
^^ ^101 F1 \ ^^ : : | Function key number plus 100 ^^ ^124 F24 /
^^ ^146 Delete \ ^^ ^148 Insert | ^^ ^149 End | ^^ ^150 Down | ^^ ^151 PgDn | These keys are represented by ^^ ^152 Left | the ASCII/GB code for the keypad ^^ ^153 Center | digit plus 100. ^^ ^154 Right | ^^ ^155 Home | ^^ ^156 Up | ^^ ^157 PgUp /
^^ Mouse clicks and double clicks (all prefixed with ^128 thru ^135) ^^ ^161 L click \ ^^ ^162 R click | ^^ ^163 L+R click | ^^ ^164 M click | ^^ ^165 L+M click | ^^ ^166 R+M click | L=left, R=right, M=middle button. ^^ ^167 L+R+M click | Prefix indicates state of shift keys. ^^ ^171 L dbl click | E.g. ^129^162 is Right shift-click. ^^ ^172 R dbl click | ^^ ^173 L+R dbl click | ^^ ^174 M dbl click | ^^ ^175 L+M dbl click | ^^ ^176 R+M dbl click | ^^ ^177 L+R+M dbl click /
^^ Base definitions: Gold is Gray +
^136+^SP ^SUPER ^136+ ^GOLD ^CHR GOLD_BASE_SET
